segments.text: I see the girl standing there, so patiently waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s not even trying to climb up like her brother, just trusting him to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s the smarter one, staying safe on the ground.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking a fall, and she’s just watching calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever fallen trying to get cookies before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spilling everywhere, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl knows better than to disturb her mother right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the jar, he might not even hear if someone calls him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t take a tumble before he gets that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR
